languages.text: "Ваша правда. Когда мы потеряли преподобного Иеронимуса, братья и сестры мои впали в отчаяние. Но впервой ли мне, бывалому душегубу, видеть смерть товарища? Ну я и начал им... сначала подсказывать, потом указания отдавать. Час нынче трудный, страждущих много — нельзя было раскисать. Братие мои прислушались, а потом зачем-то возомнили, что я меж ними теперь старшина".

traits.locale_text: "Честно говоря, я сам в замешательстве. Когда мы потеряли отче Иеронимуса, многие миссионеры впали в отчаяние и были на грани паники. А я же бывалый душегуб, мне не впервой видеть как товарищи помирают. Так что я собрался и начал раздавать указания, чтобы людей из шока вывести, да и работа на месте не стояла. И все ко мне начали приходить сначала по мелочам, потом с вопросами посерьезнее, пока, наконец, вся миссия не начала меня слушать. А я и не против дело в свои руки взять, раз больше некому".

languages.text: "You'll hear no argument from me. When we lost Reverend Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to wallow in a puddle of grief. My brothers and sisters heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."
languages.original_text: "Ваша правда. Когда мы потеряли преподобного Иеронимуса, братья и сестры мои впали в отчаяние. Но впервой ли мне, бывалому душегубу, видеть смерть товарища? Ну я и начал им... сначала подсказывать, потом указания отдавать. Час нынче трудный, страждущих много — нельзя было раскисать. Братие мои прислушались, а потом зачем-то возомнили, что я меж ними теперь старшина".

traits.locale_text: "Fair enough. When we lost Father Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to melt in a puddle of grief. My comrades heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

"Fair enough. When we lost Father Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to melt in a puddle of grief. My comrades heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to melt in a puddle of grief. My comrades heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

"Fair enough. When we lost Father Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, the hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to melt in a puddle of grief. My comrades heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

"You'll hear no argument from me. When we lost Reverend Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to wallow in a puddle of grief. My brothers and sisters heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

"You'll hear no argument from me. When we lost Reverend Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to wallow in a puddle of grief. My brothers and sisters heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

languages.text: “我对此没有异议。当希罗尼穆斯牧师离我们而去时，我所有兄弟姐妹都陷入了绝望之中。但我是个铁石心肠的杀手，我曾亲眼见到过战友死去的情形。所以……我开始向他们提供建议，给他们下达指示。在这艰难的时刻，这么多人都在受苦受难，我们决不能沉浸在悲痛中无法自拔。我的兄弟姐妹们听从了我的建议，然后不知怎么的，他们就觉得我应该当负责人。”
languages.original_text: "You'll hear no argument from me. When we lost Reverend Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to wallow in a puddle of grief. My brothers and sisters heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。当希罗尼穆斯神父离我们而去时，我所有兄弟姐妹都陷入了绝望之中。但我是个铁石心肠的杀手，我曾亲眼见到过战友死去的情形。所以……我开始向他们提供建议，给他们下达指示。在这种艰难的时候，这么多人都在受苦受难，我们决不能沉浸在悲痛中无法自拔。我的伙伴们听从了我的建议，然后不知怎么的，他们就觉得我应该当负责人。”

languages.text: 「私は反論するつもりはありません。私達がヒエロニムス牧師を失った時、私の兄弟や姉妹は、絶望しました。でも、一番人を殺してきた私は、仲間の死を何度も目にしてきた。だから私は…彼らにまず提案し、その後指示を出しました。大勢の人々が苦しみの中にいる厳しい時代には、悲しみの水たまりに浸ってる余裕もありません。兄弟姉妹たちは私の言うことを聞き、そしていつの間にか、私が場を仕切る存在になっていました」
languages.original_text: "You'll hear no argument from me. When we lost Reverend Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to wallow in a puddle of grief. My brothers and sisters heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

traits.locale_text: 「そうですか。私達がヒエロニムス牧師を失った時、私の兄弟や姉妹は、絶望しました。でも、一番人を殺してきた私は、仲間の死を何度も目にしてきた。だから私は…彼らにまず提案し、その後指示を出しました。大勢の人々が苦しみの中にいる厳しい時代には、悲しみの水たまりの中で溶けている余裕もありません。仲間たちは私の言うことを聞き、そしていつの間にか、私が場を仕切る存在になっていました」

languages.text: «Yo no pienso quejarme. Cuando perdimos al reverendo Hieronymus, mis hermanos y hermanas perdieron la esperanza. Yo, como monstruo que soy, ya había visto morir a mis camaradas, así que poco a poco acabé siendo el que daba instrucciones. En tiempos difíciles como estos, con tanta gente sufriendo, no podíamos ahogarnos en un charco de dolor. Mis hermanos y hermanas me hicieron caso y, de alguna manera, empezaron a pensar que yo estaba al mando».
languages.original_text: "You'll hear no argument from me. When we lost Reverend Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to wallow in a puddle of grief. My brothers and sisters heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

traits.locale_text: «Entiendo. Cuando perdimos al padre Hieronymus, mis hermanos y hermanas perdieron la esperanza. Yo, como monstruo que soy, ya había visto morir a mis camaradas, así que poco a poco acabé siendo el que daba instrucciones. En tiempos difíciles como estos, con tanta gente sufriendo, no podíamos ahogarnos en un charco de dolor. Mis camaradas me hicieron caso y, de alguna manera, empezaron a pensar que yo estaba al mando».

languages.text: "Also gut. Als wir Reverend Hieronymus verloren haben, sind meine Brüder und Schwestern in Verzweiflung geraten. Doch ich, abgefeimter Mörder, der ich bin, hatte schon viele Kameraden sterben sehen. Also habe ich ... Vorschläge gemacht, anfangs, und ihnen dann Anweisungen gegeben. In harten Zeiten wie diesen, wo so viele leiden, konnten wir es uns nicht erlauben, zu einer Pfütze der Trauer zusammenzuschmelzen. Meine Brüder und Schwestern haben auf mich gehört, und dann haben sie sich irgendwie in den Kopf gesetzt, das ich ab jetzt das Sagen habe."
languages.original_text: "You'll hear no argument from me. When we lost Reverend Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to wallow in a puddle of grief. My brothers and sisters heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

traits.locale_text: "Also gut. Als wir Vater Hieronymus verloren haben, sind meine Brüder und Schwestern in Verzweiflung geraten. Doch ich, abgefeimter Mörder, der ich bin, hatte schon viele Kameraden sterben sehen. Also habe ich ... Vorschläge gemacht, anfangs, und ihnen dann Anweisungen gegeben. In harten Zeiten wie diesen, wo so viele leiden, konnten wir es uns nicht erlauben, zu einer Pfütze der Trauer zusammenzuschmelzen. Meine Kameraden haben auf mich gehört, und dann haben sie sich irgendwie in den Kopf gesetzt, das ich ab jetzt das Sagen habe."

languages.text: « Je ne vais pas discuter. Quand nous avons perdu le révérend Hiéronymus, mes frères et mes sœurs ont sombré dans le désespoir. Pour ma part, ce n'était pas la première fois que je voyais un camarade mourir, je leur ai donc... fait des suggestions, qui sont peu à peu devenues des instructions. Quand les temps sont durs et que le monde souffre, nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de nous morfondre. mes frères et sœurs m'ont écouté et, avec le temps, se sont mis en tête que j'étais désormais leur chef. »
languages.original_text: "You'll hear no argument from me. When we lost Reverend Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to wallow in a puddle of grief. My brothers and sisters heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas moi qui dirai le contraire. Quand nous avons perdu le père Hiéronymus, mes frères et mes sœurs ont sombré dans le désespoir. Pour ma part, ce n'était pas la première fois que je voyais un camarade mourir, je leur ai donc... fait des suggestions, qui sont peu à peu devenues des instructions. Quand les temps sont durs et que le monde souffre, nous ne pouvons pas nous permettre de nous morfondre. Ils m'ont écouté et, avec le temps, se sont mis en tête que j'étais désormais leur chef. »

languages.text: "Aksini söylemem mümkün değil. Muhterem Hieronymus'u kaybettiğimizde, kardeşlerim umusuzluğa sürüklendi ancak ben eski bir katilim ve daha önce yoldaşlarımın gözlerimin önünde ölmesine şahit oldum. Dolayısıyla ilk başta onlara... Tavsiyelerde bulundum, ardından talimatlar verdim. Birçok insanın acı çektiği böyle zor zamanlarda yas tutup pinekleme lüksüne sahip değiliz. Kardeşlerim sözlerimi dinlediler ve bir şekilde artık yönetimde benim olduğumu düşünmeye başladılar."
languages.original_text: "You'll hear no argument from me. When we lost Reverend Hieronymus, my brothers and sisters despaired. But I, hardened killer that I am, had seen my comrades die before. So I made... suggestions to them at first, and then gave them instructions. In hard times like these, with so many people suffering, we couldn't afford to wallow in a puddle of grief. My brothers and sisters heeded me, and then somehow got it into their heads that I was in charge now."

traits.locale_text: "Aksini söylemem mümkün değil. Muhterem Hieronymus'u kaybettiğimizde, kardeşlerim umusuzluğa sürüklendi ancak ben eski bir katilim ve daha önce yoldaşlarımın gözlerimin önünde ölmesine şahit oldum. Dolayısıyla ilk başta onlara... Tavsiyelerde bulundum, ardından talimatlar verdim. Birçok insanın acı çektiği böyle zor zamanlarda yas tutup pinekleme lüksüne sahip değiliz. Kardeşlerim sözlerimi dinlediler ve bir şekilde artık yönetimde benim olduğumu düşünmeye başladılar."
